name: Wanonn Party
description:
Multiplayer game, Competitive, Last One Standing, Party Game

Wanonn Party is a Third-Person Multiplayer game where you play through several different minigames, until only one player stands victorious.

Features:

- Multiplayer play with other player up to 40 players.

- Different minigames to play.

4 MiniGames available:

Hide and Seek

• Seeker have to find and eliminate a player

• If a seeker gets an eliminated, they turns into a hider

• if a seeker fails to eliminate someone, they will be eliminated himself

Race

• Race to the finish

• Don't fall out of bounds

• The slowest players are eliminated

My Banana

• Hold the banana as long as you can to increase score

• Push someone else to steal their banana

• The players with lowest score at the end will be eliminated

Bomb Tag

• Some players are tagged and obtain a bomb

• Pass the bomb to someone else before the time runs out

• When the time runs out, the player holding the bomb will be eliminated
